title: Scenario-Based Online Discussions for Intercultural Dialogue and Critical Consciousness Development

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of multicultural environments and expertise in language education
context.additional_context: Digital device-supported language instruction for practicing professionals with project-based assessment systems

learning_goals: Learners can improve their ability to analyze power structures that may arise during intercultural interactions.
Learners can generate three or more critical questions that respect cultural differences in scenario-based discussions.
Learners can propose and implement two or more effective mediation strategies in cultural conflict situations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
